title: Clean up Aether Wing Kayle's attack frame
body: Just a request for Kayle's skin Aether Wing to match her other skins/default skin's attack frames. The Aether Wing skin is slightly (but noticeably) slower than her other skins (I.e Riot Kayle). Considering this is her most expensive skin I find it quite odd that it comes with a fallback (albeit it's most likely not on purpose). Keep in mind I'm not requesting a buff towards her attack rate, just a fix for this one skin to make it more playable for Kayle players.

replies.body:
A follow up on this - I looked into her auto attacks and this isn't going to be something as easy as  moving the animation timing around to change the pose on the hit frame like I had hoped.

Talked to the animators who were here when she was made. The story is that the autos were authored to have a bit more follow-through in the swing to look better with fast attack speeds, however, because this was a much earlier time there was a lot for us to learn about gameplay feel and how much decisions like this can really change it.

Sadly because I'd have to actually reanimate a good chunk of the attack anims it becomes a much larger task to fix and there's just not time slotted for it. For now, she will be remaining the same, sorry guys :(.

This problem occurs for me much more frequently on Aether Wing skin because it is slower than the others... I eventually got fed up and switched back to battleborn because of this
